name: Greedy Goblin (itch)
description:
This game was originally made for the LudumDare 29th competition with the name of "Ogre's Gold".

In this 3D third Person Exploration game you must go deep underground to obtain those precious gold coins. Use flares and fire lights to help locate yourself in the darkness.

LIMITLESS
Have unlimited fun with auto-generated maps, go as deep as you can possibly can.
